Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent

Class AccordionServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.AccordionServiceFluent<T>
public class AccordionServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> extends Object
Provides fluent API methods for interacting with Accordion UI components.

This class encapsulates interactions with Accordion elements, allowing actions such as expansion, collapsing, retrieving states, and verifying their properties. It integrates with AccordionService to perform operations in a structured manner.

The generic type T represents the main UI service fluent class that this service extends, allowing method chaining within the fluent API structure.

Author:
